title: Haiwang Yuan on Yuan Dynasty Secondary Q4

content.question: All of the following are factually accurate. Which would most strongly support the author’s claim regarding the Yuan dynasty and religious tolerance in the third paragraph?

choices.label: Khubilai Khan introduced paper currency intended for use everywhere.
Tibetans were often recruited to serve in the Yuan dynasty’s military forces.
The Yuan rulers welcomed European travelers and merchants.
The Yuan rulers financed the building of Christian churches in China.

content.answer: The Yuan rulers financed the building of Christian churches in China.

topic.text: 2.2: The Mongol Empire and the Making of the Modern World
